messages.message: btw for the fix Natasha described above, do you want us to backport this to 23.39? @Kerry

you mean the experience to create the first class? let's not backport it, but improve it in the next round -- do help me make sure things like this (polishing and addressing feedback) doesn't slip our radar and actually gets scheduled in a later release. @lydia and I had chatted about eng time set aside to address feedback, and this should go into that.
